placeholder.heading: Board of Funeral Directors; duties of Mayor; duties of Board; compensation of Board.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 5-84, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-401.

Law 7-104, the "Technical Amendments Act of 1987," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 7-346, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 24, 1987 and December 8, 1987, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 22, 1987, it was assigned Act No. 7-124 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.

Law 13-91, the "Technical Amendments Act of 1999," was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 13-435, which was referred to the Committee of the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 2, 1999, and December 7, 1999, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 29, 1999, it was assigned Act No. 13-234 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 13-91 became effective on April 12, 2000.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority pursuant to Law 5-84, see Mayor's Order 87-186, August 3, 1987.
